verses.verse: Now it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H325>Ahasuerus,<s%> <S%H1931>(this<s%> is <S%H325>Ahasuerus<s%> which <S%H4427>reigned,<s%> from <S%H1912>India<s%> even to <S%H3568>Ethiopia,<s%> over an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H4082>provinces:<s%>)

That in <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> when the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H325>Ahasuerus<s%> <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of his <S%H4438>kingdom,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was in <S%H7800>Shushan<s%> the <S%H1002>palace,<s%>

In the <S%H7969>third<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of his <S%H4427>reign,<s%> he <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H4960>feast<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H8269>princes<s%> and his <S%H5650>servants;<s%> the <S%H2428>power<s%> of <S%H6539>Persia<s%> and <S%H4074>Media,<s%> the <S%H6579>nobles<s%> and <S%H8269>princes<s%> of the <S%H4082>provinces,<s%> being <S%H6440>before<s%> him:

And when <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> were <S%H4390>expired,<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H4960>feast<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> that were <S%H4672>present<s%> in <S%H7800>Shushan<s%> the <S%H1002>palace,<s%> both to <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H6996>small,<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> in the <S%H2691>court<s%> of the <S%H1594>garden<s%> of the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1055>palace;<s%>

Where were <S%H2353>white,<s%> <S%H3768>green,<s%> and <S%H8504>blue,<s%> hangings, <S%H270>fastened<s%> with <S%H2256>cords<s%> of fine <S%H948>linen<s%> and <S%H713>purple<s%> to <S%H3701>silver<s%> <S%H1550>rings<s%> and <S%H5982>pillars<s%> of <S%H8336>marble:<s%> the <S%H4296>beds<s%> were of <S%H2091>gold<s%> and <S%H3701>silver,<s%> on a <S%H7531>pavement<s%> of <S%H923>red,<s%> and <S%H8336>blue,<s%> and <S%H1858>white,<s%> and <S%H5508>black,<s%> <S%H8336>marble.<s%>

And they gave them <S%H8248>drink<s%> in <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> (the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> being <S%H8138>diverse<s%> <S%H3627>one<s%> from another,) and <S%H4438>royal<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> in <S%H7227>abundance,<s%> according to the <S%H3027>state<s%> of the <S%H4428>king.<s%>

And the <S%H8360>drinking<s%> was according to the <S%H1881>law;<s%> <S%H369>none<s%> did <S%H597>compel:<s%> for <S%H3651>so<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> had <S%H3245>appointed<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7227>officers<s%> of his <S%H1004>house,<s%> that they should <S%H6213>do<s%> according to every <S%H376>man's<s%> <S%H7522>pleasure.<s%>

<S%H1571>Also<s%> <S%H2060>Vashti<s%> the <S%H4436>queen<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H4960>feast<s%> for the <S%H802>women<s%> in the <S%H4438>royal<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> which belonged to <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H325>Ahasuerus.<s%>

On the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> when the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> was <S%H2896>merry<s%> with <S%H3196>wine,<s%> he <S%H559>commanded<s%> <S%H4104>Mehuman,<s%> <S%H968>Biztha,<s%> <S%H2726>Harbona,<s%> <S%H903>Bigtha,<s%> and <S%H5>Abagtha,<s%> <S%H2242>Zethar,<s%> and <S%H3752>Carcas,<s%> the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H5631>chamberlains<s%> that <S%H8334>served<s%> in the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of <S%H325>Ahasuerus<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%>

To <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H2060>Vashti<s%> the <S%H4436>queen<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> with the <S%H3804>crown<s%> <S%H4438>royal,<s%> to <S%H7200>show<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> and the <S%H8269>princes<s%> her <S%H3308>beauty:<s%> for she was <S%H2896>fair<s%> to <S%H4758>look<s%> on.

But the <S%H4436>queen<s%> <S%H2060>Vashti<s%> <S%H3985>refused<s%> to <S%H935>come<s%> at the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1697>commandment<s%> by his <S%H5631>chamberlains:<s%> therefore was the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7107>wroth,<s%> and his <S%H2534>anger<s%> <S%H1197>burned<s%> in him.

Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H2450>wise<s%> men, which <S%H5234>knew<s%> the <S%H6256>times,<s%> (for <S%H3651>so<s%> was the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1697>manner<s%> <S%H6440>toward<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H5234>knew<s%> <S%H1881>law<s%> and <S%H1779>judgment:<s%>

And the <S%H7138>next<s%> to him was <S%H3771>Carshena,<s%> <S%H8369>Shethar,<s%> <S%H133>Admatha,<s%> <S%H8659>Tarshish,<s%> <S%H4825>Meres,<s%> <S%H4826>Marsena,<s%> and <S%H4462>Memucan,<s%> the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H6539>Persia<s%> and <S%H4074>Media,<s%> which <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H6440>face,<s%> and which <S%H3427>sat<s%> the <S%H7223>first<s%> in the <S%H4438>kingdom;<s%>)

<S%H4100>What<s%> shall we <S%H6213>do<s%> to the <S%H4436>queen<s%> <S%H2060>Vashti<s%> according to <S%H1881>law,<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> <S%H834><s%> she has not <S%H6213>performed<s%> the <S%H3982>commandment<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H325>Ahasuerus<s%> by the <S%H5631>chamberlains?<s%>

And <S%H4462>Memucan<s%> <S%H559>answered<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> and the <S%H8269>princes,<s%> <S%H2060>Vashti<s%> the <S%H4436>queen<s%> has not done <S%H5753>wrong<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H905>only,<s%> but also to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8269>princes,<s%> and to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> that are in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4082>provinces<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H325>Ahasuerus.<s%>

For this <S%H1697>deed<s%> of the <S%H4436>queen<s%> shall <S%H3318>come<s%> <S%H3318>abroad<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H802>women,<s%> so that they shall <S%H959>despise<s%> their <S%H1167>husbands<s%> in their <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> when it shall be <S%H559>reported,<s%> The <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H325>Ahasuerus<s%> <S%H559>commanded<s%> <S%H2060>Vashti<s%> the <S%H4436>queen<s%> to be <S%H935>brought<s%> in <S%H6440>before<s%> him, but she <S%H935>came<s%> not.

Likewise shall the <S%H8282>ladies<s%> of <S%H6539>Persia<s%> and <S%H4074>Media<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H8269>princes,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> have <S%H8085>heard<s%> of the <S%H1697>deed<s%> of the <S%H4436>queen.<s%> Thus shall there arise <S%H1767>too<s%> <S%H1767>much<s%> <S%H963>contempt<s%> and <S%H7110>wrath.<s%>

<S%H518>If<s%> it <S%H2895>please<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> let there <S%H3318>go<s%> a <S%H4438>royal<s%> <S%H1697>commandment<s%> from him, and let it be <S%H3789>written<s%> among the <S%H1881>laws<s%> of the <S%H6539>Persians<s%> and the <S%H4074>Medes,<s%> that it be not <S%H5674>altered,<s%> That <S%H2060>Vashti<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> more <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H325>Ahasuerus;<s%> and let the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> her <S%H4438>royal<s%> estate to <S%H7468>another<s%> that is <S%H2896>better<s%> than she.

And when the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H6599>decree<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he shall <S%H6213>make<s%> shall be <S%H8085>published<s%> throughout <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H4438>empire,<s%> (for it is <S%H7227>great,<s%>) <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H802>wives<s%> shall <S%H5414>give<s%> to their <S%H1167>husbands<s%> <S%H3366>honor,<s%> both to <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H6996>small.<s%>

And the <S%H1697>saying<s%> <S%H3190>pleased<s%> <S%H5869><s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> and the <S%H8269>princes;<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H4462>Memucan:<s%>

For he <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H5612>letters<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H4082>provinces,<s%> into every <S%H4082>province<s%> according to the <S%H3791>writing<s%> thereof, and to <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> after their <S%H3956>language,<s%> that every <S%H376>man<s%> should <S%H8323>bear<s%> <S%H8323>rule<s%> in his own <S%H1004>house,<s%> and that it should be <S%H1696>published<s%> according to the <S%H3956>language<s%> of every <S%H5971>people.<s%>
